ARABIC: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So make lumps from heaven fall down on us if you are telling the truth.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But in case you are speaking the truth, then make a segment of the sky to fall upon us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So cause a piece of the sky to fall upon us if you are truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Let a part of the sky fall on us if what you say is true".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Therefore cause a part of the sky to fall upon us, if you are of the truthful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, cause a piece of the heaven to fall on us, if you are of the truthful!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore cause a portion of the heaven to come down upon us, if you are one of the truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then drop down on us lumps from heaven, if thou art one of the truthful.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then make fragments of the heaven fall upon us, if thou art of the truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So cause a fragment of the sky to fall on us, if you are truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So cause thou a fragment of the heaven to fall upon us, if thou art of the truth-tellers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Make a fragment of the sky falls upon us, should you be truthful.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Now cause a piece of the sky to fall on us, if thou art truthful!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So cause a piece of the heaven to fall on us, if you are of the truthful!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Drop down on us lumps from heaven, if you are one of the truthful'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So bring down on us pieces from the sky, if you are truthful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:187] Then make fragments (read kisfan or kisafan) of the heaven fall upon us, if you are of the truthful’, in your Mission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then make fragments of the heaven fall upon us) as punishment, (if thou art of the Truthful) that the punishment is coming.
